name: Mega Arena
description:
Third person mulitplayer shooter game.

8 GAME MODES!

→ DeathMatch
→ Team DeathMatch → Classic
→ Capture The Flag
→ Asymmetrical game mode example
→ Multistage rounds game mode example
→ Fast Battle Royale
→ Battle Royale - solo, duo, squad x4, 50x50 game modes

You can host or join a game. Much more!!!
